name: Piece of Madness
description:
Gameplay demo of a project I've been working on called, well, you can read the title.

This game is going to be a story-heavy game without skeletons where the player plays an old mercenary that lost their army, but that's for another demo.

This is a demo that's trying to test out the mobility and combat with an endless hoard mode with skeletons in a small level. Comment about what you think of it. And if there are any bugs, that would help too if ya commented about those. Just comment about anything you feel like commenting about, but mostly those.

PS: don't run out of weapons, especially at the start. You can't fight anymore without weapons.

-----CONTROLS-----

WASD - Move

MOUSE - Turn/aim

LMOUSE - Standard attack

RMOUSE - Special attack (destroys weapon)

LSHIFT - Dodgeroll (+ pickup weapons)

R - Restart level

Objective: Survive
